features: Handheld Steam Iron: This 1875 watt iron features more steam and adjusts to all fabrics; features a Nano Titanium soleplate that's corrosion resistant, delivers heat evenly and glides smoothly across garments
Special Features: Features temperature control dial and vertical steam for versatility; Its pointed detailer tip creates crisp pleats, pockets, cuffs, and collars, plus glides easily between buttons
Corrosion Resistant: This durable steam iron is corrosion resistant, with an anti-calc calcium collector and self cleaning function; Includes auto shutoff feature for safety
Conair Cloting Irons: Our irons have earned the Good Housekeeping Seal and keep your clothing smooth and wrinkle free. Check out entire line irons ranging in size and wattage / performance.
Innovative Garment Care: From fabric shavers and traditional irons to garment steamers, both handheld and full size, we make high-quality garment care accessories
body.description: The Conair Extreme Steam Pro Steam Iron features 49% more steam and 25% more power that the Conair WCI306R! The Nano titanium soleplate effortlessly glides across garments, evenly distributing heat for professional results. It provides powerful steam in continuous horizontal or vertical blasts. It also features anti-calcium, anti-corrosion, self-cleaning, and auto shutoff features. Its pointed detailer tip creates crisp pleats, pockets, cuffs, and collars, plus glides easily between buttons. The temperature dial caters to most fabrics!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Conair Extreme Steam 1875 Watt Pro Steam Iron Conair Extreme Steam 1625 Watt Ultimate Steam Iron Conair EZ Press 800 Watt Dual Voltage Travel Steam Iron Conair Extreme Steam 1550 Watt Super Steam Iron Benefits Easy to use steam iron. Rose gold Nano Titanium soleplate provides smooth glide, powerful burst of steam button, and variable temperature control dial. Precision tip great for collars and between buttons. Automatic shut off. Easy to use steam iron. Nano Titanium soleplate provides smooth glide, powerful burst of steam button, and variable temperature control dial. Precision tip great for collars and between buttons. Automatic shut off. This iron is powerful for home use, and small enough for travel. Dual voltage switch allows you to easily change from 120v to 240v. Variable steam, plus a powerful burst of steam. Perfect for travelers and crafters and removes wrinkles fast. Easy to use steam iron. Rainbow finish Nano Titanium soleplate provides smooth glide, powerful burst of steam button, and variable temperature control dial. Precision tip great for collars and between buttons. Automatic shut off. Features 1875 watt horizontal/vertical steam iron, Nano Titanium soleplate with precision tip, smooth glide, burst of steam, large rotating variable temp control, calcium collector, auto off, corrosion resistant soleplate, self cleaning, uses tap water. 1625 watt horizontal/vertical steam iron, Nano Titanium soleplate with precision tip, smooth glide, burst of steam, large rotating variable temp control, calcium collector, auto off, corrosion resistant soleplate, self cleaning, uses tap water. 800 watt travel steam iron, dual voltage, Stainless Steel Easy Glide Soleplate with precision tip, burst of steam, variable steam control, easy to fill water tank and includes fill cup, antislip rubber heels. 1550 watt horizontal/vertical steam iron, rainbow Nano Titanium soleplate w/precision tip, smooth glide, burst of steam, variable temperature control, calcium collector, auto off, corrosion resistant soleplate, self cleaning, uses tap water. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sturdy iron
reviews.reviewText: I was devastated when the iron I've been using for the last 11 years finally stopped working. I did a lot of online research for a replacement and discovered to my dismay that standards had slipped with a lot of the brands that were trusted in the past. I have a couple of other Conair items, and they've worked well for me, so I thought I'd try the Conair iron. I am loving it! It produces a lot of steam, it doesn't spit or leak. It's heavy, but I like that, as it means I don't have to press as hard. I like the titanium plate, as it doesn't pit or degrade as other surfaces do. I am very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good iron. I love it! It gets out wrinkles with ease. After using for the 1st time my clothes looked like it came from the cleaners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Iron is sturdy. Steam comes out, which is what I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m able to see local channels!
reviews.reviewText: Set up is so quick and we were able to enjoy most of our local channels instantly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price, high heat and steam output. Great price
reviews.reviewText: Wow. This was almost half the price of the other iron model I considered. It gets hot, hot, hot and can get out wrinkles my last three irons could not. I almost gave up on ever having a hot iron again. Makes ironing easy and quick. I hope it lasts. So far so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It's a waste of money
reviews.reviewText: It leaks water, it doesn't heat up enough to iron. The heat turns off in the middle of me ironing and it doesn't turn back on. It's a terrible product. The worst iron I have ever owned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Believe it or not i'm on my 4th iron... i sew alot and have gone through irons... i'm actually surprised becuase i thought they lasted much longer. Anyway, i'm pleased with this one, it looks great, sleek, gets nice and hot, it's a little heavier than i thought it might be but i really like it alot !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Best Iron I've Had In Years! But it only lasted 17 months!
reviews.reviewText: About a decade ago the iron I had had for about a decade finally died. I then went on a horrible journey of buying one iron after another that died within a year or so, sometimes within months. And I am talking about top-of-the-line name brands. They leaked, scorched and the sole plates would be a mess in no time.But this ConAir is really a champ. After 17 months, the sole plate is pristine and it has ironed smoothly and well, but it died suddenly. I replaced it with a less expensive and simpler iron that had a horrible soleplate that gunked up after using it only a few weeks. I am returning it. And, reluctantly, am ordering this Conair model again because no iron seems to last two years any longer, and this is a consumer issue that must be addressed. It appears that manufacturers are making irons (and other products) that do not last so we consumers must purchase them more often than our parents and grandparents did.
Prend beaucoup moins de temps à repasser que mon ancien j'adore!
Was skeptical to order this iron as it was used but honestly I love it
Fonctionne très bien. Cordon d'alimentation un peu court à notre goûtrecommandé
Worth every penny spent. I'm a 52 year old guy & I'm not an expert on irons but I can say that this is by far the best I have ever used.
